name: Balls & Boxes
description:
Oh no! There is trouble at the Toy Factory and the Ball Department is working overtime. Help them out by sorting the plummeting balls into the matching containers!

Balls fall faster and faster the better and longer you play. How long can you do the work without fail? Press the buttons at the bottom of the screen to swap rearrange the boxes so that they catch the corresponding colored ball!

This is a great game especially for children that helps develop motor skills and visual perception.

Features:

- Easy to Learn
- One-Touch Control
- Endless Arcade Style Game Play
- Colorful Graphics
- Amazing Music and Sound FX
